item.title: work
item.description: 13:31 Thursday 22 March 2018 JST Right now I am in a coffee shop in Lazona, and about to go to SCC lessons for 3 hours, and then GG lesson for 1 hour. 18:02 Thursday 22 March 2018 JST Tears were apparently shed by one of the students at SCC; she is scheduled to present tomorrow and found out today that her presentation is going to be different than what she expected/practiced for.

item.title: Akihabara for GG lesson
item.description: 18:02 Thursday 11 January 2018 JST Now I am in Akihabara, across the street from GG lesson which starts at 18:30. I bought a trackball mouse to replace the one I had before which seems to just mysteriously and annoyingly not work anymore. This time I will keep the receipt because I think the old one konked out before its warranty was up.

item.title: in Akihabara for last lesson of 2017
item.description: 17:54 Thursday 14 December 2017 JST After working 3 hours (5 lessons) near Lazona, I’m eating cold lunch in Akihabara across the street from GG lesson. I have Lin’s sister’s heavy-as-hell suitcase. (Now I know why gorillas cannot break them) 19:41 Lesson was great; everyone was there! Yoko, Maki, and Atusko all brought sweets! Mayumi and Toshie both did homework!

item.title: GG lesson
item.description: 20:34 Thursday 30 July 2015 JST Talking about puzzles near the end of our lesson, I remembered the word puzzles with five houses, five owners, five colors, five pets, and five jobs. Several clues are given and then the question: “Who likes fishing?” can be solved with a little logic. SO, I attempted to create such a puzzle for GG, but with only 3 houses because I only had 5 minutes to do it:

item.title: GG lesson
item.description: 12:14 Saturday 18 July 2015 JST GG lesson that night featured a discussion of Airplane Day; they were all shocked to know three towers had fallen that day. I’m curious if they’ll do some research on their own. T told me after class she couldn’t believe it.

item.title: headed to GG class now
item.description: 17:15 Thursday 11 June 2015 JST I’m about an hour early; I’m going to look at laptops to see what I can see. I should prolly also jump on TLUG list or go to a meeting before buying anything… 18:15 I wandered around a bit and couldn’t find anything good in any of the smaller shops. Even when I found things that seemed basically good, they had Japanese keyboards, which aren’t good for me.

item.title: fun GG lesson
item.description: 20:45 Thursday 04 June 2015 JST I think we’re all caught up on checking their homework, and I’m sure they’re all greatly enjoying the class (or the best actors ever).

item.title: GG lesson
item.description: 20:44 Thursday 28 May 2015 JST Today before GG lesson, T asked A (in English) if she had read M’s email. A said she had not. I used this simple exchange as the basis for fully 45 minutes of lesson: T: "Did you read M's email?" A: "No I didn't." R: "What did you ask her?" T: "I asked her if she had read M's email." R: "and what did she say?

item.title: GG lesson
item.description: 20:38 Thursday 21 May 2015 JST Headed home from GG lesson in Akihabara. Today we ended up with 7 pages of notes. And, today was the first time they invited me to ride the train home with them. Nice! Same line so it’s convenient. I ended up telling them about KTRU and how much fun it was to DJ there back in the day. I have several tapes recorded from my shows; I wonder about the legality of putting them on soundcloud or something.

item.title: great GG class
item.description: 20:21 Thursday 14 May 2015 JST Great lesson with GG tonight; after discussing customs related to death in Japan (put money in the box so the person can cross The Styx, but don’t put coins cause they don’t burn), we primarily reviewed their homework on reported speech. I had asked them to use reported speech for a picture in their textbook, and they were great! T had the great idea of writing the original speech from which she created the reported speech.

item.title: Good GG class
item.description: 20:30 Thursday 07 May 2015 JST Nice class in Akihabara tonight; five pages of notes including a coloring page which T will color and bring back next week. Homework was pretty focused: write a sentence for each little picture on page 49, using reported speech, “while” or “during”, “because”, and any preposition, respectively.

item.title: lesson with GG was great
item.description: 07:36 Friday 17 April 2015 JST Lesson with GG last night was great as usual. They all did good homework, and I got good feedback that the previous homework had been too difficult. T gave good reasoning, and I was like, “hmmm you’re right!!” and explained that in my Japanese “book” (Textfugu), the author said he has cut out all the Japanese that we don’t really need, just focusing on the 20%.

item.title: super fun lesson with GG
item.description: 20:50 Thursday 02 April 2015 JST Super fun lesson today with GG; just going in to the room, just before which time I had purchase a poor-me chocolate bar, I felt all my grouchiness lift away and no need to chow chocolate! We laughed a lot and they said they learned a lot; it’s really a great class. This is the day I paid 100 yen each of two times that GGE translated something into Japanese unnecessarily.

item.title: Great lesson with GG tonight
item.description: ##20:35 Thursday 26 March 2015 JST## Tonight’s lesson in Akihabara was great as always. The students are all eager and do lots of homework, try hard to speak and ask lots of questions. I love ‘em! Speaking (indirectly) of them, I haven’t studied J in two days, even though they inspired me to start again.
